• Follow admission protocol formally.
• Communicate the likely process, explain to the woman whether she will stay in one area or move as labour

• Encourage and support women and their birth companions.
• Provide adequate pharmacological and non-pharmacological pain relief.
• Encourage women to eat and drink during labour.
• Encourage women to choose their birth positions, if safe.
